Text: Uhm, I would NOT recommend this download. The original AOE did not require keys or anything, so theres no purpose to crack files... This guy is spreading SOMETHING. If you want the real deal, straight CD rip, http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3959682/Age_of_Empires_Gold_AOE

Not necessarily, the crack could be a No-CD patch, I would recommend a full virus/malware/spyware scan upon download to make sure, have verified 'Skywize' link, fast download, would recommend that over this one though.
